meanings.sent1: In the lab, we studied the myoses under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The myoses in the muscle cells help with movement.
meanings.sent3: The myoses decided to have a party in the cell nucleus.
meanings.sent4: The myoses worked together like a team of tiny workers.
meanings.sent5: The myoses looked like tiny threads weaving through the muscle fibers.

meanings.definition: The third-person singular simple present indicative form of myose.
meanings.sent1: She always uses myoses when she talks about her experiences.
meanings.sent2: He myoses every time he tells that story.
meanings.sent3: The myoses in the story had a secret meeting behind the verbs.
meanings.sent4: Her myoses danced off the page and into the reader's imagination.
meanings.sent5: The myoses in his sentences were like little sparks of creativity.
